Package danogl.components

Class GameObjectPhysics

java.lang.Object
danogl.components.GameObjectPhysics
public class GameObjectPhysics
extends java.lang.Object
Encapsulates the physics-related attributes of a GameObject
Author:
Dan Nirel

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static float IMMOVABLE_MASS
    When a GameObject with this mass collides with another GameObject, and they are both set to not only collide but also to resolve the collision themselves (using preventIntersectionsFromDirection(Vector2), this object's velocity will not be affected by the collision.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameObjectPhysics()

    Returns the object's collider

    Returns the direction from which intersections are resolved by the engine.
    float mass()
    Returns the GameObject's mass.

    Sets the direction from which objects are prevented from intersecting.

    Sets the GameObject's collider
    void setMass​(float mass)
    Sets the GameObject's mass.

  • Field Details

    • IMMOVABLE_MASS

      public static final float IMMOVABLE_MASS
      When a GameObject with this mass collides with another GameObject, and they are both set to not only collide but also to resolve the collision themselves (using preventIntersectionsFromDirection(Vector2), this object's velocity will not be affected by the collision.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • GameObjectPhysics

      public GameObjectPhysics()

  • Method Details

    • collider

      public Collider collider()
      Returns the object's collider

    • setCollider

      public void setCollider​(Collider collider)
      Sets the GameObject's collider

    • directionFromWhichIntersectionsArePrevented

      public Vector2 directionFromWhichIntersectionsArePrevented()
      Returns the direction from which intersections are resolved by the engine. (1,0) for example means that objects coming from the right will not intersect with this object, provided the objects are set to collide in the first place, and that the other object is also set to prevent intersections.

    • preventIntersectionsFromDirection

      public void preventIntersectionsFromDirection​(Vector2 dirToPrevent)
      Sets the direction from which objects are prevented from intersecting.
      See Also:
      directionFromWhichIntersectionsArePrevented()

    • mass

      public float mass()
      Returns the GameObject's mass. The mass is relevant for collision resolution (see directionFromWhichIntersectionsArePrevented()

    • setMass

      public void setMass​(float mass)
      Sets the GameObject's mass. The mass is relevant for collision resolution (see directionFromWhichIntersectionsArePrevented()
